subject: OFFICER: Susan Flint
body:
OFFICER: Susan Flint
ADDRESS: Address: Head Office Location Address: 452 5th Ave, New York,
NY 10018, United States
REFERENCE NUMBER : 0040TTE054639EBK
Good Morning and happy new week as well, This is another notification from us.
This is Susan Flint Director ATM Payment Department HSBC - BANK of London UK. I want to inform you again that HSBC BANK UK has been writing an email
to you regarding the delivery of your ATM CARD worth $1,800,000, 00 USD and your inability to pay the $400 delivery and Insurance charge
this honorable bank has concluded to prove to you the legitimacy of the fund, and has decided to pay for the Delivery/Insurance charge of
your ATM CARD.
HSBC bank has successfully sent your ATM CARD down to your HSBC branch in your Country. This branch was successful in registering your ATM
CARD to the UNITED NATION DELIVERY AGENT for overnight delivery but the UNITED NATION DELIVERY Man insisted that 
Non- Inspection
Certificate must be obtained at your Airport before he will proceed to your Home Address and the Certificate will cost him just $198 only on
this new year policy's. Please the bank cannot get the $198 to him right now.
You're Advised to send the $198 to him today through BTC/Bitcoin or Itunes card or purchase Razor Gold gift card $198 single card and send the picture
and receipt.
The delivery Man will arrive at your home address tomorrow morning. So you must send him the $198 to enable him to get to your home address safely.
Please kindly reconfirm the delivery details to ensure that the correct address is provided.
Full Name
Home address.
Private phone number.
Age.
And any picture of your identity possibly.
Note: The delivery Man is not aware of the content of the package because the Package was registered with your name as a friend. And there is an Iphone
13 plus and HSBC T-Shirt attached to the package. Do not ignore it as part of the gift sent to you.
Mr. Chris Mark
Contact Him Here ,Diplomat email for record keeping.
crismark816@gmail.com
Thanks
Susan Flint

subject: Re: OFFICER: Susan Flint
body:
Good morning, Susan Flint! Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you're doing well. I received your email regarding the delivery of my ATM card from HSBC BANK UK. I appreciate the bank's efforts to prove the legitimacy of the fund and cover the delivery insurance charge.

I understand that the United Nations Delivery Agent requires an inspection at my local airport before proceeding to my home address. Could you please provide more information about this inspection? What exactly does it involve, and why is it necessary?

Also, you mentioned that I need to send payment through BTC Bitcoin or purchase iTunes or Razor Gold gift cards. Can you explain why these specific methods are required? Is there a particular reason for not accepting other forms of payment?

Lastly, could you please confirm the delivery details that you have on file? I want to make sure that the correct address is provided for a smooth delivery process.

Thank you again for your assistance, Susan. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jose
